named-query.name: Vehicle.findByPlate
named-query.query: select v from Vehicle v where v.plateNumber = ?1

named-query.name: WorkOrder.findByIds
named-query.query: select a from WorkOrder a where a.id in ?1

named-query.name: WorkOrder.findByMechanicId
named-query.query: select w from WorkOrder w join w.mechanic m where m.id = ?1

named-query.name: PaymentMean.findByInvoiceId
named-query.query: select m from Invoice f join f.workOrders w join w.vehicle.client c join c.paymentMeans m where f.id = ?1

named-query.name: Mechanic.findByDni
named-query.query: select m from Mechanic m where m.dni = ?1

named-query.name: Mechanic.findAllInForce
named-query.query: select m from Mechanic m where m.contract.state = ?1

named-query.name: Mechanic.findInForceInContractType
named-query.query: select m from Mechanic m where m.contract.contractType.name = ?1

named-query.name: Mechanic.findAllInProfessionalGroup
named-query.query: select m from Mechanic m where m.contract.professionalGroup.name = ?1

named-query.name: Invoice.findByNumber
named-query.query: select f from Invoice f where f.number = ?1

named-query.name: Contract.findByMechanicId
named-query.query: select c from Contract c join c.mechanic m where m.id = ?1

named-query.name: Contract.findByProfessionalGroupId
named-query.query: select c from Contract c where c.professionalGroup.id = ?1

named-query.name: ContractType.findByName
named-query.query: select c from ContractType c where c.name = ?1

named-query.name: ProfessionalGroup.findByName
named-query.query: select p from ProfessionalGroup p where p.name = ?1

named-query.name: Payroll.findCurrentMonthPayrolls
named-query.query: select p from Payroll p where FUNC('MONTH', p.date) = ?1 and FUNC('YEAR', p.date) = ?2

named-query.name: Payroll.findByContract
named-query.query: select p from Payroll p where p.contract.id = ?1

named-query.name: Payroll.findCurrentMonthByContractId
named-query.query: select p from Payroll p where p.contract.id = ?1

named-query.name: Payroll.findByDate
named-query.query: select p from Payroll p where FUNC('MONTH', p.date) = ?1 and FUNC('YEAR', p.date) = ?2
